Desc.entry: A social enterprise which offers step by step support for community groups wishing to partner and visit a community group in the developing world. Primarily the service has been working with a select group of communities in Southern Africa but is now expanding worldwide. The service is available to school communities as well as youth groups, scouts, guides, women's groups, professional members groups and faith groups. A not-for-profit enterprise, Company limited by guarantee no 7112720.
